name: P.220508#01
description:
MP4 - AAC / 2min 33s
@WO_N_OW | Live improvised drawing, video & concrete music.

Original performance: 55min / canvas: 150cm × 350 cm


"P.XXXXXX" are live performances of improvised drawing integrating concrete music and video. 

The performer draws on a canvas placed on the floor. A camera picks up the performer from above and the video is simultaneously projected on a projection screen. 

The public positioned around the canvas sees the performer and the projection simultaneously.

The concrete music is either composed beforehand and becomes the sound support of the solo performance or is improvised live by sound artists.
